      • findCommonDenominator

        static Fraction findCommonDenominator(Fraction first,
                                      Fraction second)
        Finding a common denominator by multiplying the denominators with each other. example:

        first fraction: 2/3
        second fraction 1/2
        returns: 4/6

        * @param first
        Parameters:
        second -
        Returns:
        the first fraction reduced to the common with second fraction

        fraction: 2/3
        returns: 3/2

      • getIrreducibleFraction

        static Fraction getIrreducibleFraction(Fraction fraction)
        According to Wikipedia: An irreducible fraction (or fraction in lowest terms or reduced fraction) is a fraction in which the numerator and denominator are integers that have no other common divisors than 1 (and -1, when negative numbers are considered).
        example:
        1st fraction: given 2/4 returning 1/2 which is irreducible 2nd fraction: given 5/6 returning 5/6 becouse is irreducible
        Parameters:
        fraction -
        Returns:
        irreducible fraction

      • findGreatestCommonDivisor

        static int findGreatestCommonDivisor(int firstNumber,
                                     int secondNumber)
        In mathematics, the greatest common divisor (gcd) of two or more integers, which are not all zero, is the largest positive integer that divides each of the integers. For example, the gcd of 8 and 12 is 4.
        Parameters:
        firstNumber -
        secondNumber -
        Returns:
        greatest common divisor;
